tool_description: Easy to implement API that delivers quality data on the doctor and practice information you need (name, address, specialty etc.) through a RESTful API.
name: BetterDoctor Doctor and Provider Data
title: BetterDoctor Doctor and Provider Data

api_list.name: Practice Search
api_list.description: Search for provider service locations (practices or doctor's offices).

optional_parameters.name: Name
optional_parameters.description: The practice’s name. Partial (type-ahead) names are accepted.

optional_parameters.name: Location
optional_parameters.description: Search area - either circular (lat,lon,range (miles)) or bounding box (top-right, bottom-left) (lat,lon,lat,lon). Location slugs (ca-berkeley) are also accepted. Slugs are returned as part of the doctor's practices. Also supports state codes e.g. NY or ny.

api_list.name: Doctor Search by name

optional_parameters.name: Name
optional_parameters.description: The doctor's name; searches in both first and last names. Partial (type-ahead) characters/names are accepted.
